channel.title: Clean Up Resources on AWS System Manager
channel.description: Recent content in Clean Up Resources on AWS System Manager

item.title: 8.1. Clean Up Resources
item.description: RDS test instances & unnecessary snapshots EC2 (runtime & builder), EBS, Security Groups ECR images (optional) S3 FE bucket AWS Backup plan & vaults (when sure the data is no longer needed) AWS Config conformance pack & S3 delivery (optional) SNS, Lambda, EventBridge created for DR testing
